parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

interestPropertyName.description: The name that is displayed for the interest property

interestCompoundType.description: The indicator used to specify the method of calculation of compound interest

interestCompoundTypeValue.description: The calculated interest amount using the associated compound interest type

consolidateInterest.description: The calculated interest amount using the associated compound interest type

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

paymentTypeName.description: The name that is displayed for the paymentType

propertyName.description: The name that is displayed for the property

paymentMethod.description: The type of method used for the payment

chargeSchedulePaymentValue.description: The amount of the scheduled charge

openActualBalance.description: The actual balance of the account as at the start of the current business day.

availableOverdraftLimit.description: The amount of the unused overdraft limit

approvedOverdraftLimit.description: The ammount of the approved overdraft

limitExpiryDate.description: This field specifies the validity of the Limit, i.e. how long is it to remain in force

outstandingOverdraftLimit.description: The outstanding amount of the overdraft limit

onlineClearedBalance.description: The total of cleared funds booked against the account. Same as onlineActualBalance with the exception of credit or reversed debit entries with the exposure date in the future.

openClearedBalance.description: The cleared balance of the account as at the start of the current business day

accountWithBankBIC.description: BIC of Account with Bank being the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

code.description: The identifier of the error message

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
